name: Gloves of Faith
tooltip:
Gloves of FaithLevel 60

Father Inigo Montoy at Light's Hope Chapel in the Eastern Plaguelands will make Gloves of Faith if you bring him the following: 1 Desecrated Gloves, 8 Wartorn Cloth Scraps and 4 Mooncloth.

Requirements:
- Desecrated Gloves
- Wartorn Cloth Scrap x 8
- Mooncloth x 4
